title: Oven-baked Mushroom Pilaf with Sausages
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '1 celery stick, sliced', '1 onion, chopped', '250g cup mushrooms, halved or sliced', '250g basmati rice, rinsed', '800ml hot vegetable stock, made with stock cubes', '400g can red kidney beans, or borlotti or flageolet beans, drained and rinsed', '250g frankfurters, Polish sausage or German Bockwurst, cut into short lengths', '3 strips of orange zest', '2 bay leaves', '10g fresh parsley']
